name: Deadpool
quote: Please don't make the super suit green...or animated!

details.name: Deadpool
details.plot: Wade Wilson is a dishonorably discharged special forces operative working as a mercenary when he meets Vanessa, a prostitute. They become romantically involved, and a year later she accepts his marriage proposal. Wilson is diagnosed with terminal cancer, and leaves Vanessa without warning so she will not have to watch him die.

details.name: Deadpool 2
details.plot: After fighting organized crime as the mercenary Deadpool for two years, Wade Wilson fails to kill one of his targets on his anniversary with Vanessa, his girlfriend. That night, after the pair decides to start a family together, the target tracks Wilson down and inadvertently kills Vanessa.

details.name: Iron Man
details.plot: Tony Stark, who has inherited the defense contractor Stark Industries from his father Howard Stark, is in war-torn Afghanistan with his friend and military liaison, Lieutenant Colonel James Rhodes, to demonstrate the new Jericho missile.

details.name: Iron Man 2
details.plot: In Russia, the media covers Tony Stark's disclosure of his identity as Iron Man. Ivan Vanko, whose father, Anton Vanko, has just died, sees this and begins building a miniature arc reactor similar to Stark's.

details.name: Iron Man 3
details.plot: At a New Year's Eve party in 1999, Tony Stark meets scientist Maya Hansen, the inventor of an experimental regenerative treatment named Extremis that allows recovery from crippling injuries.

details.name: Captain America: Civil War
details.plot: In 1991, the brainwashed super-soldier James Bucky Barnes is dispatched from a Hydra base in Siberia to intercept an automobile carrying a case of super-soldier serum.

details.name: Avengers: Infinity War
details.plot: Having acquired the Power Stone, one of the six Infinity Stones, from the planet Xandar, Thanos and his lieutenants—Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian, Proxima Midnight, and Corvus Glaive—intercept the spaceship carrying the survivors of Asgard's recent destruction.

details.name: Avengers: Endgame
details.plot: Twenty-three days after Thanos used the Infinity Gauntlet to disintegrate half of all life in the universe, Carol Danvers rescues Tony Stark and Nebula from deep space and returns them to Earth, where they reunite with the remaining Avengers—Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Thor, Natasha Romanoff, and James Rhodes—and Rocket.

name: Captain America
quote: I can do this all day

details.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
details.plot: In the present day, scientists in the Arctic uncover an old, frozen aircraft. In March 1942, Nazi officer Johann Schmidt and his men steal a mysterious relic called the Tesseract, which possesses untold powers, from the town of Tønsberg in German-occupied Norway.

details.name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
details.plot: Two years after the Battle of New York, Steve Rogers works in Washington, D.C., for the espionage agency S.H.I.E.L.D. under Director Nick Fury, while adjusting to contemporary society.

details.name: Captain America: Civil War
details.plot: In 1991, the brainwashed super-soldier James Bucky Barnes is dispatched from a Hydra base in Siberia to intercept an automobile carrying a case of super-soldier serum.

details.name: Avengers: Infinity War
details.plot: Having acquired the Power Stone, one of the six Infinity Stones, from the planet Xandar, Thanos and his lieutenants—Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian, Proxima Midnight, and Corvus Glaive—intercept the spaceship carrying the survivors of Asgard's recent destruction.

details.name: Avengers: Endgame
details.plot: Twenty-three days after Thanos used the Infinity Gauntlet to disintegrate half of all life in the universe, Carol Danvers rescues Tony Stark and Nebula from deep space and returns them to Earth, where they reunite with the remaining Avengers—Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Thor, Natasha Romanoff, and James Rhodes—and Rocket.

name: Spiderman
quote: With great power comes great responsibility

details.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
details.plot: Following the Battle of New York, Adrian Toomes and his salvage company are contracted to clean up the city, but their operation is taken over by the Department of Damage Control (D.O.D.C.), a partnership between Tony Stark and the U.S.

details.name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
details.plot: In Ixtenco, Mexico, Nick Fury and Maria Hill investigate an unnatural storm and encounter the Earth Elemental. Quentin Beck, a super-powered individual, arrives to defeat the creature.

details.name: Captain America: Civil War
details.plot: In 1991, the brainwashed super-soldier James Bucky Barnes is dispatched from a Hydra base in Siberia to intercept an automobile carrying a case of super-soldier serum.

details.name: Avengers: Infinity War
details.plot: Having acquired the Power Stone, one of the six Infinity Stones, from the planet Xandar, Thanos and his lieutenants—Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian, Proxima Midnight, and Corvus Glaive—intercept the spaceship carrying the survivors of Asgard's recent destruction.

details.name: Avengers: Endgame
details.plot: Twenty-three days after Thanos used the Infinity Gauntlet to disintegrate half of all life in the universe, Carol Danvers rescues Tony Stark and Nebula from deep space and returns them to Earth, where they reunite with the remaining Avengers—Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Thor, Natasha Romanoff, and James Rhodes—and Rocket.

details.name: Doctor Strange
details.plot: In Kathmandu, the sorcerer Kaecilius and his zealots enter the secret compound Kamar-Taj and behead its librarian. They steal a few pages from an ancient, mystical text belonging to the Ancient One, a long-lived sorcerer who has taught every student at Kamar-Taj, including Kaecilius, in the mystic arts.

details.name: Avengers: Infinity War
details.plot: Having acquired the Power Stone, one of the six Infinity Stones, from the planet Xandar, Thanos and his lieutenants—Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian, Proxima Midnight, and Corvus Glaive—intercept the spaceship carrying the survivors of Asgard's recent destruction.

details.name: Avengers: Endgame
details.plot: Twenty-three days after Thanos used the Infinity Gauntlet to disintegrate half of all life in the universe, Carol Danvers rescues Tony Stark and Nebula from deep space and returns them to Earth, where they reunite with the remaining Avengers—Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Thor, Natasha Romanoff, and James Rhodes—and Rocket.

name: Black Widow
quote: I'm always picking up after you boys.

details.name: Iron Man 2
details.plot: In Russia, the media covers Tony Stark's disclosure of his identity as Iron Man. Ivan Vanko, whose father, Anton Vanko, has just died, sees this and begins building a miniature arc reactor similar to Stark's.

details.name: The Avengers
details.plot: In a SHIELD facility, Agent Phil Coulson explains to his superior Nick Fury that the Tesseract has begun radiating an unusual form of energy. The object is Loki, the Asgardian demigod and Thor's brother, who stole the Tesseract and plans to use it to conquer Earth.

details.name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
details.plot: Two years after the Battle of New York, Steve Rogers works in Washington, D.C., for the espionage agency S.H.I.E.L.D. under Director Nick Fury, while adjusting to contemporary society.

details.name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
details.plot: In the Eastern European country of Sokovia, the Avengers—Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Thor, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanoff, and Clint Barton—raid a Hydra facility commanded by Baron Wolfgang von Strucker, who has been experimenting on humans using the scepter previously wielded by Loki.

details.name: Black Widow
details.plot: In Ohio in 1995, young Natasha Romanoff and her sister Yelena Belova are taken to a Red Room facility. There, the girls and other widows are trained in combat and espionage at the orders of General Dreykov.

details.name: Thor
details.plot: The warrior Thor is cast out of the fantastic realm of Asgard by his father Odin for his arrogance and sent to Earth to live among humans. Falling in love with scientist Jane Foster teaches Thor much-needed lessons, and his new-found strength comes into play as a villain from his homeland sends dark forces toward Earth.

details.name: The Avengers
details.plot: In a SHIELD facility, Agent Phil Coulson explains to his superior Nick Fury that the Tesseract has begun radiating an unusual form of energy. The object is Loki, the Asgardian demigod and Thor's brother, who stole the Tesseract and plans to use it to conquer Earth.

details.name: Thor: The Dark World
details.plot: Eons ago, Bor, father of Odin, clashes with the Dark Elf Malekith, who seeks to unleash a weapon known as the Aether on the nine realms.

details.name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
details.plot: In the Eastern European country of Sokovia, the Avengers—Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Thor, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanoff, and Clint Barton—raid a Hydra facility commanded by Baron Wolfgang von Strucker, who has been experimenting on humans using the scepter previously wielded by Loki.

details.name: Thor: Ragnarok
details.plot: Two years after the Battle of Sokovia, Thor has been unsuccessfully searching for the Infinity Stones, and is now imprisoned by the fire demon Surtur in Muspelheim.

details.name: Captain America: Civil War
details.plot: In 1991, the brainwashed super-soldier James "Bucky" Barnes is dispatched from a Hydra base in Siberia to intercept an automobile carrying a case of super-soldier serum.

details.name: Black Panther
details.plot: In 1992, King T'Chaka visits his brother N'Jobu, who is working undercover in Oakland, California.

details.name: Avengers: Infinity War
details.plot: In the aftermath of the bombing of the United Nations headquarters in Vienna, Austria, at which King T'Chaka is killed, his son T'Challa, who is the Black Panther, returns to Wakanda to assume the throne.

details.name: Avengers: Endgame
details.plot: Twenty-three days after Thanos used the Infinity Stones to disintegrate half of all life across the universe, Carol Danvers rescues Tony Stark and Nebula from deep space.

details.name: Captain Marvel
details.plot: The story follows Carol Danvers as she becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

details.name: Avengers: Endgame
details.plot: Twenty-three days after Thanos used the Infinity Stones to disintegrate half of all life across the universe, Carol Danvers rescues Tony Stark and Nebula from deep space.

details.name: Avengers: Infinity War
details.plot: Having acquired the Power Stone, one of the six Infinity Stones, from the planet Xandar, Thanos and his lieutenants—Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian, Proxima Midnight, and Corvus Glaive—intercept the spaceship carrying the survivors of Asgard's recent destruction.

details.name: Avengers: Endgame
details.plot: Twenty-three days after Thanos used the Infinity Gauntlet to disintegrate half of all life in the universe, Carol Danvers rescues Tony Stark and Nebula from deep space and returns them to Earth, where they reunite with the remaining Avengers—Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Thor, Natasha Romanoff, and James Rhodes—and Rocket.
